testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to access users with balances through the API connection.
testcase.name: The information returned in the response with ID(x) should be verified, including
testcase.system-out: Given The API user sets "api/users/with-balance" path parameters............passed And The API user saves the response from the api users with-balance endpoint with valid authorization information.passed Then Verify the information of the one with the index 0 in the API user response body: "kaan", "user1", "kaanuser1", "kaanuser1@abcd.com", "TR", "903456789123", 0, "100000.00000000".passed
